description: Creates a rotation in an on-call schedule.

parameters.name: ContactIds
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the contacts to add to the rotation. The order that you list the contacts in is their shift order in the rotation schedule. To change the order of the contact's shifts, use the  UpdateRotation operation. (string) ---

parameters.name: TimeZoneId
parameters.description: The time zone to base the rotation's activity on in Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) format. For example: 'America/Los_Angeles', 'UTC', or 'Asia/Seoul'. For more information, see the Time Zone Database on the IANA website.

parameters.name: Recurrence
parameters.description: Information about the rule that specifies when a shift's team members rotate. MonthlySettings (list) --- Information about on-call rotations that recur monthly. (dict) --- Information about on-call rotations that recur monthly. The day of the month when monthly recurring on-call rotations begin. The time of day when a monthly recurring on-call shift rotation begins. The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends. The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends. WeeklySettings (list) --- Information about on-call rotations that recur weekly. (dict) --- Information about rotations that recur weekly. The day of the week when weekly recurring on-call shift rotations begins. The time of day when a weekly recurring on-call shift rotation begins. DailySettings (list) --- Information about on-call rotations that recur daily. (dict) --- Details about when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends. The number of contacts, or shift team members designated to be on call concurrently during a shift. For example, in an on-call schedule containing ten contacts, a value of 2 designates that two of them are on call at any given time. ShiftCoverages (dict) --- Information about the days of the week included in on-call rotation coverage. (string) --- (list) --- (dict) --- Information about when an on-call shift begins and ends. Start (dict) --- Information about when the on-call rotation shift begins. End (dict) --- Information about when the on-call rotation shift ends. The number of days, weeks, or months a single rotation lasts.

nested_params.name: MonthlySettings
nested_params.description: Information about on-call rotations that recur monthly.

nested_params.name: DayOfMonth
nested_params.description: The day of the month when monthly recurring on-call rotations begin.

nested_params.name: HandOffTime
nested_params.description: The time of day when a monthly recurring on-call shift rotation begins.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: WeeklySettings
nested_params.description: Information about on-call rotations that recur weekly.

nested_params.name: DayOfWeek
nested_params.description: The day of the week when weekly recurring on-call shift rotations begins.

nested_params.name: HandOffTime
nested_params.description: The time of day when a weekly recurring on-call shift rotation begins.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: DailySettings
nested_params.description: Information about on-call rotations that recur daily.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: NumberOfOnCalls
nested_params.description: The number of contacts, or shift team members designated to be on call concurrently during a shift. For example, in an on-call schedule containing ten contacts, a value of 2 designates that two of them are on call at any given time.

nested_params.name: ShiftCoverages
nested_params.description: Information about the days of the week included in on-call rotation coverage.

nested_params.name: Start
nested_params.description: Information about when the on-call rotation shift begins.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: End
nested_params.description: Information about when the on-call rotation shift ends.

nested_params.name: HourOfDay
nested_params.description: The hour when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: MinuteOfHour
nested_params.description: The minute when an on-call rotation shift begins or ends.

nested_params.name: RecurrenceMultiplier
nested_params.description: The number of days, weeks, or months a single rotation lasts.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Optional metadata to assign to the rotation. Tags enable you to categorize a resource in different ways, such as by purpose, owner, or environment. For more information, see Tagging Incident Manager resources in the Incident Manager User Guide. (dict) --- A container of a key-value name pair. Key (string) --- Name of the object key. Value (string) --- Value of the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: Name of the object key.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: Value of the tag.

nested_items.name: RotationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created rotation.
